title: Find Common Elements in Python Lists
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the set intersection operation in Python to find the common elements between two lists.

meta.title: Python List Intersection | Programming Tutorials | Lab
meta.description: Learn how to easily find the common elements between two lists using the set intersection operation in Python. Discover a simple function to perform list intersection.

i18n.title: Encontrar elementos comunes en listas de Python
